IN ADDITION, MEMBER STATIONS MUST PAY POSTAGE BOTH WAYS ON TAPES
SHIPPED TO AND FROM THE NETWORK. FOR A STATION IN YOUR AREA THIS
WOULD AMOUNT TO APPROXIMATELY #200.00 A YEAR IF YOU AVAILED YOUR¬
SELF OF ALL THE PROGRAMS MADE AVAILABLE BY THE NETWORK. (THERE IS
A STRONG POSSIBILITY THAT THERE WILL SOON BE CONGRESSIONAL ACTION
TO LOWER RATES FOR EDUCATIONAL RECORDINGS, WHICH WOULD MAKE POSTAGE
PAYMENTS CONSIDERABLY LOWER.) EVEN WITH THE POSTAGE CHARGES YOU
SEE THAT THE COST PER HOUR OF PROGRAMMING (FOR ij.00 HOURS, OR MORE)
IS VERY LOW.
In ADDITION TO THE REGULAR NETWORK SERVICE OESClRBED ABOVE (A SAMPLE
Network offering is included in the material being sent separately),
WE MAKE AVAILABLE IN-SCHOOL PROGRAMS TO THOSE STATIONS WHO DO IN-
SCHOOL BROADCASTING. FOR THIS SERVICE A STATION PAYS AN ADDITIONAL
FEE OF ONE-FOURTH OF THE REGULAR ASSESSMENT, OR #2.00 PER REEL,
WHICHEVER IS LESS. HOWEVER, SINCE MANY IN-SCHOOL STATIONS ARE NOT
ON THE AIR DURING THE SUMMER MONTHS, SUCH STATIONS ARE ALLOWED TO
SUBSTITUTE THE IN-SCHOOL PROGRAMS FOR REGULAR PROGRAMS THEY WOULD
RECEIVE OURING THE SUMMER, AND THUS PAY NO ADDITIONAL FEE FOR THE IN-
SCHOOL SERVICE. IF A STATION OWNED AND OPERATED BY A SCHOOL OR SCHOOL
SYSTEM PREFERS TO SUBSCRIBE TO ONLY THE IN-SCHOOL PROGRAMS, THEY MAY
DO THIS UNDER A MODIFIED AGREEMENT. IN THIS CASE, THE STATION GETS
ALL IN-SCHOOL PROGRAMS, PLUS ONE HOUR A WEEK FROM THE REGULAR NETWORK
OFFERINGS, FOR ONE-HALF THE FEE THEY WOULD NORMALLY PAY FOR THE FULL
SERVICE. OF COURSE, THE CONDITIONS REGARDING POSTAGE PAYMENTS REMAIN
THE SAME.
